business.name: Vamos Events
business.about: Vamos Events was born out of love to music and the desire to create and share remarkable events with the world. Our roster of entertainers includes interactive MCs, DJs, Musicians & Live Artists with multifaceted talents & flavors but with one common goal in mind — to turn every single occasion into an unforgettable experience! With a successful track in the entertainment industry including consultations, planning, curating music playlists to various types of events including weddings, corporate events, nightclubs, hotels, fashion shows, destination weddings, social and private occasions, we have the knowledge and expertise to provide you with a top notch, unparalleled journey from the first steps of planning to the final cords of your event.
business.tone_description: Luxury yet friendly — polished, refined, like a high-end concierge, but also upbeat and enthusiastic with an intimate, personal and customized approach.
business.differentiator: We don't focus on competing — we focus on creating. Our strength lies in our unique fusion of energy, musicianship, production precision, and immersive atmosphere. Every event is designed with intention — not replicated, not templated, not mass-produced. We combine live musicians, DJs, MCs, dancers, and technical production into one seamless experience. It's a fully curated performance flow where sound, lighting, timing, and energy are synchronized. We craft moments. We read the room. We build momentum. We transform spaces into experiences.
business.video_caption: A personal welcome from Albert — watch before we chat!

services.name: Professional DJ Services
services.description: Up to 6 hours of playtime, DJ Controller, Custom DJ Booth
services.notes: Price varies by event type: private, corporate, or wedding

services.name: Professional MC Services
services.description: Up to 5 hours, Entertainment Leader, Entertainment Itinerary

services.name: Roaming Saxophone Player
services.notes: Cocktail 2hrs: $1,000. Cocktail+Dinner 4hrs: $1,400. Full evening 5hrs: $1,500. Classic & Fire Sax 5hrs: $2,000 (availability+venue approval). +$200/extra hr.

services.name: Female Vocalist
services.description: Top 40 covers, Bossa Nova, Jazz, Lounge

services.name: Classic or Electric Violin
services.description: Female artist. Ceremony, Cocktail, Dinner options.

services.name: Classic or Electric Cello
services.description: Female artist. Ceremony, Cocktail, Dinner options.

services.name: Flamenco Guitar, Saxophone & Congo Trio
services.notes: Cocktail only 1.5hrs: $2,400. Extended (no break): +$900. Break over 1hr: priced per event.

services.name: Fusion Band (ADD-ON)
services.description: 4 artists — musicians & singer. 4 hours. Does NOT include MC/DJ.
services.notes: Add-on to existing DJ booking ONLY. Client chooses musicians except Fire Sax.

pricing.weekday_weekend_rule: Weekdays: Mon-Thu (excl. stat holidays/long weekends). Weekend rates: Fri-Sun + all stat holidays + long weekends. NYE: separate pricing.
pricing.deposit: 50% deposit to secure date. Remaining 50% due before or on event day.

disqualification_rules.cultural_specific: For specific ethnic/cultural events, ask to contact Albert directly to confirm accommodation

venues.name: Hotel X — Glass Room / New Fort Hall
